'''Mobile Edition''' may refer to:

* {{BE}}: the current mobile edition of Minecraft that supports crossplay with different platforms.
**[[Minecraft Preview]] an app that players can use to test out new features that are in development.
*{{el|pe}}: the discontinued mobile edition that got replaced with Bedrock Edition.
**[[Pocket Edition Alpha]]: the first and only development phase of Pocket Edition.
**[[Pocket Edition Lite]]: a free version of Pocket Edition that got discontinued after [[v0.2.1 alpha2]].
**[[Pocket Edition Demo]]: a demo of Pocket Edition that was never released to the public but playable at {{w|E3 2011}}
* {{el|ce}}, the mainland China version of ''Minecraft'' for Windows, Android, iOS, iPadOS, and macOS.
